title: Emmerdale spoilers: Shock twist confirmed as Vinny isn't actually Mandy's son
text:
Mandy Dingle (Lisa Riley) made a triumphant return to Emmerdale earlier this year with son Vinny (Bradley Johnson) in tow, and she’s wasted little time in getting her feet under the table. What’s more, her return has brought with it plenty of drama — not to mention having brought plenty of secrets to light too, the biggest of which has yet to be revealed on screen, as it seemingly turns out that Vinny isn’t actually Mandy’s son!

Earlier this year, Mandy made a brief return to the village with a mission, as she set out to prove that Bear Wolf (Joshua Richards) was Paddy’s (Dominic Brunt) biological father. However, as she departed, Vinny questioned why she never revealed the real reason that she came home, thus confirming that she’s hiding something from her family.

Since making a more permanent return to the Dales a couple of months back, Mandy has done nothing but keep secrets from her clan, and it seems as if her and Vinny have been harbouring a pretty game-changing one, as Lisa Riley told The Sun that Vinny’s not actually Mandy’s son.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Speaking to The Sun, Lisa said: ‘Who is he? Even I’m yet to find that out – it’s all still to unfold.’

‘But Vinny just wants to be part of the family and although the audience finds out that he’s not Mandy’s son, the Dingles never do – Mandy makes sure of that.’

‘Who is his mother? That’s the big question – will it be a cast member, we just don’t know.’

The other big question, of course, is what Mandy’s motivations in lying about Vinny’s parentage could be?

Due to the uncanny resemblance, viewers were convinced that Vinny was Paddy’s son when he first showed up in the village. However, Mandy went out of her way to dispel that theory — but it’s likely that, whoever they are, Vinny’s parents could be of importance.

Emmerdale continues on Tuesday 15th October at 7pm on ITV.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Mandy's been keeping plenty of secrets!
